code: import React from"react";export var insertArray=function insertArray(array,index,item){array.splice(index,0,item);};export var colour=function colour(suit){if(suit.toLowerCase()==='diamond'){return'#40a9ff';}else if(suit.toLowerCase()==='spade'){return'#ffc53d';}else if(suit.toLowerCase()==='heart'){return'#ff4d4f';}else if(suit.toLowerCase()==='club'){return'#73d13d';}};export var suit_icon=function suit_icon(suit){if(suit==='diamond'){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"diamond"}," \u2666 ");}else if(suit==='spade'){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"spade"}," \u2660 ");}else if(suit==='heart'){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"spade"}," \u2665 ");}else if(suit==='club'){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"spade"}," \u2663 ");}};export var _to_fixed=function _to_fixed(value){if(value!=null){return value.toFixed(2);}else{return"";}};export var _lineup=function _lineup(lineup){if(lineup!=null){return lineup;}else{return"";}};
